body:
---

## What happened

(please describe what you were doing when this exception occurred)

## Version information

IntelliJ IDEA `2019.2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 38.1.4` • Dart plugin `192.5728.98`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

update failed for ActionGroup: null (null)[null]

comment_data.body: Thanks for the report! This was fixed by https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/pull/3742; we expect to have a patch to M38 with the fix in the near term.

title: Error getting Flutter sdk information.
